page.title: 20Negative Attitudes
page.content: Adults often say that local children nowadays have no respect for anyone or anything.It is true that many swear, shun adult advice,are rowdy,cycle with impunity on pavements and in other public places where cycling is banned, drop litter,write on walls,damage public property,take drugs and steal, but perhaps no more than in previous generations.Many adults commit the same offences.Family break-up is increasing.Many children live with one parent or neither.Many live with a step parent or other parent-substitute cohabiting with the natural parent. Sexual permissiveness is increasing. The attitude to work is worsening,in part because of waning job prospects. Nearly a quarter of households keep a dog,and excrement is deposited without consideration for others on footpaths and in public parks.
